selectedVerses.text: For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evils. It is through this craving that some have wandered away from the faith and pierced themselves with many pangs.
The snares of death encompassed me; the pangs of Sheol laid hold on me; I suffered distress and anguish.
The peoples have heard; they tremble; pangs have seized the inhabitants of Philistia.
What will you say when they set as head over you those whom you yourself have taught to be friends to you? Will not pangs take hold of you like those of a woman in labor?
God raised him up, loosing the pangs of death, because it was not possible for him to be held by it.
